bill_title: Proposing and submitting to the electors at the next general election an amendment to Article XXIX of the Constitution of the State of South Dakota to authorize the state to own or to participate in the ownership, development, or operation of agricultural processing facilities.

bill_versions.bill_text: A JOINT RESOLUTION, Proposing and submitting to the electors at the next general election an amendment to Article XXIX of the Constitution of the State of South Dakota to authorize the state to own or to participate in the ownership, development, or operation of agricultural processing facilities. BE IT RESOLVED BY THE SENATE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA, THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES CONCURRING THEREIN: Section 1. That at the next general election held in the state, the following amendment to Article XXIX of the Constitution of the State of South Dakota, as set forth in section 2 of this Joint Resolution, which is hereby agreed to, shall be submitted to the electors of the state for approval. Section 2. That Article XXIX of the Constitution of the State of South Dakota be amended by adopting a new section to read as follows: § 2. The Legislature may provide by law and appropriate money for the development, purchase, construction, and operation of agricultural processing plants or facilities, within or without the state, for the processing of agricultural products. The state may develop, own, and operate the plant or facility or may share in the development, ownership, or operation of the plant or facility with any public or private organization, person, or entity.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
